Are you talking about Sakura Sogoro?=C2=A0 Took place in what is now Chiba =
Prefecture (Boso Hanto back then).=C2=A0 Taxes too high, he put a sign up o=
n a bridge the daimyo was to pass iirc, taxes were lowered and=C2=A0he and =
his family were put to death from what I recall.
=C2=A0
http://forums.samur=
ai-archives.com/viewtopic.php?t=3D434
=C2=A0
http://www005.upp.so-net.ne.jp=
/aoh/SAKURA.HTM
4th paragraph there
=C2=A0
Kabuki play on it:=C2=A0 http://=
kabuki21.com/sakura_giminden.php
=C2=A0
Nice little fantastical illustratio=
n here:=C2=A0 http://dappan.net/research/tanaka/2.html
=C2=A0
There's a pla=
ce in Chiba prefecture called Sakura (visited it when I was=C2=A0a boy and =
didn't pay as much attention as I should have) - believe it's a city now.=
=C2=A0 Has a shrine called the Sogo Reid Sanctuary (Toshoji, which the site=
 calls Toshoji temple which is like saying Tosho temple temple):=C2=A0 http=
://www.chiba-tour.jp/narita/sight/sight_top.html
=C2=A0
Hope this helps.
